title: The owner of the plot shall be eligible for TDR as per Zonal (basic) FSI of the plot in lieu of handing over of the land affected by road
clause_text: The owner of the plot shall be eligible for TDR as per Zonal (basic) FSI of the plot in lieu of handing over of the land affected by road. TDR for such land shall be issued only when ownership of land has been transferred in PR card in the name of MCGM.
section: Removal and re-accommodation of tolerated /protected structures falling in the alignment of road: -
